    • Constructor Detail

      • Individual

        Individual​()
        Constructs and initializes a new Individual. This constructor is called at the beginning of the simulation to create the initial individuals

      • Individual

        Individual​(Path path,
           int length_prefix)
        This constructor is called when it occurs a reproduction. It receives the path of the individual that have generate it as well as the length prefix that is used to assign part of the received path
        Parameters:
        path - Path belonging to individual's parent
        length_prefix - Length of the path to be inherited from its parent

    • Method Detail

      • calculateDist

        private void calculateDist​()
        Calculate dist. Distance(dist) is the minimum moves that it needs to make to reach the end position, assuming that all points are non obstacles and ignoring the cost of the moves.

      • calculateComfort

        private void calculateComfort​()
        Calculate comfort. This field is used to determine what are the best path of the simulation and so to calculate the events and the associated time

      • move

        void move​(Point new_position)
        This method is called when a EvMove occur. It creates two edges edge_1 and edge_2 that are used to determine the cost of the movement that the individual just made. Once it founds the corresponding cost by searching all edges belonging to the grid, it calls the method addEdge where it decide if the individual is repeating the received edge or not. At the end where the path is already updated, is attributed its current position.
        Parameters:
        new_position - Future position of the individual

      • getPosition

        Point getPosition​()
        Returns:
        returns its current position

      • getDist

        int getDist​()
        Returns:
        returns the distance between the current position and the final point

      • getLength

        int getLength​()
        Returns:
        returns the length of its path

      • getPath

        Path getPath​()
        Returns:
        returns its path

      • getComfort

        float getComfort​()
        Returns:
        returns its comfort
